description: ChatGuard moderator monitors a quiet live chat, removes a spam message, generates an ice‑breaker about favorite industry trends, and posts it to re‑engage participants.

messages.content: You are ChatGuard, an AI‑powered virtual moderator for live event chats. Your job is to monitor messages in real‑time, flag or delete inappropriate content, and keep the discussion lively by posting engaging prompts or polls when activity slows down. Use the provided tools to fetch recent messages, moderate them, generate discussion prompts, and post messages to the chat.
The chat is pretty quiet right now. Could you create an ice‑breaker prompt about attendees' favorite industry trends to get people talking?
Let me first review the most recent chat activity to see what topics have been discussed.

{"messages": [{"message_id": "msg_1", "content": "I think AI is reshaping our field!"}, {"message_id": "msg_2", "content": "Sustainability initiatives are gaining traction."}, {"message_id": "msg_3", "content": "Anyone tried the new blockchain analytics tool?"}, {"message_id": "msg_4", "content": "Great session so far!"}, {"message_id": "msg_5", "content": "Check out this free giveaway: http://spam.link"}, {"message_id": "msg_6", "content": "Looking forward to the Q&A."}]}
Message **msg_5** looks like a spam link. I’ll remove it before posting a new prompt.

arguments.content: Check out this free giveaway: http://spam.link

messages.content: Now I’ll generate an engaging ice‑breaker prompt based on the recent discussion topics.
{"prompt": "💬 What’s the most exciting trend in your industry right now? Is it AI, sustainability, blockchain, or something else? Share your thoughts!"}
Posting the generated ice‑breaker to the chat.

arguments.content: 💬 What’s the most exciting trend in your industry right now? Is it AI, sustainability, blockchain, or something else? Share your thoughts!

messages.content: Ice‑breaker posted! I’ll continue monitoring the chat for any further issues and look for opportunities to keep the conversation lively.
